com.climbwithyourfeet.clustering

Class KDEDensityHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.climbwithyourfeet.clustering.DensityHolder

extends DensityHolder
    Author:
    nichole

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int approxH
      the effective bandwidth of the retained kernel transformation
      protected float[] threeSDCounts
      the counts for the surface densities in array threeSDs.
      protected float[] threeSDErrors
      the errors for the points in threeSDs
      protected float[] threeSDs
      the surface densities of 3 points in the discrete density curve: threeSDs[0] is the first point above zero counts occurring before the critical surface density, threeSDs[1] is the critical surface density, threeSDs[2] is the value 1.0.

      • Fields inherited from class com.climbwithyourfeet.clustering.DensityHolder

        count, critDens, dens

    • Field Detail

      • threeSDs

        protected float[] threeSDs
        the surface densities of 3 points in the discrete density curve: threeSDs[0] is the first point above zero counts occurring before the critical surface density, threeSDs[1] is the critical surface density, threeSDs[2] is the value 1.0.

      • threeSDCounts

        protected float[] threeSDCounts
        the counts for the surface densities in array threeSDs. These can be normalized using the setter.

      • threeSDErrors

        protected float[] threeSDErrors
        the errors for the points in threeSDs

      • approxH

        public int approxH
        the effective bandwidth of the retained kernel transformation
